release.action: Refactored unit tests, replaced JMock with EasyMock 2.
Changed package names from com.qoqoa.* to com.cliffano.*
Moved usage information to Google Code Wiki.
Changed Tagyu4JException to be runtime exception.
Changed package names from com.mbledug.* to com.qoqoa.*
Refactored unit tests, introduced mock objects. Added constructors to Tagyu4J and ServiceManager.
Upgraded build to use Maven2. Refactored the code base. Added more unit tests.
Split response to tag suggestions and related tags. Suggested tags response provides category/classification. Tag provides name, relation, url.
